page.title: 11PLANTS AND ANIMALS
page.content:
This part of Devon is mostly fields and lanes and has lots of animals and plants.
The{hedgerows}are good for animals because they provide shelter and food. We found that some of the hedgerows were more than 200 years old and some of the{footpaths}much older than that.
Luckily for the{animals}the{farmers} keep the hedges and think the wild animals are good for the countryside. We had surveyed some hedgerows for {flowers}during the year and have found over{40}different wild flowers growing on (or by) them.Lots of{insects}use these flowers in the Summer and many of the insects and plants are food for many different{Birds. There are lots more plants and wild animals than people around here.
